feed.title: Category: android | Life ,The Universe and The Thing

entry.title: Gvfs-MTP support
entry.content:
Gvfs mtp

Android support in the kernel still to be tweaked even with the kernel 3.8,especially if you’re on Elementary OS Luna. So to those missing mtp support, you just need to add the following ppa.

 ppa:langdalepl/gvfs-mtp

On Debian based systems, Just copy paste the following code:

 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:langdalepl/gvfs-mtp && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
